definitions.definition: A ruler with absolute power; a tyrant .
A title awarded to senior members of the imperial family in the late Byzantine Empire, and claimed by various independent or semi-autonomous rulers in the Balkans (12th to 15th centuries)

main_definition: A ruler with absolute power; a tyrant .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A title awarded to senior members of the imperial family in the late Byzantine Empire, and claimed by various independent or semi-autonomous rulers in the Balkans (12th to 15th centuries)
